name: The Clique Quiz | Harrison, Lisi | 10 Questions

questions.text: What is the new girl's name?
questions.explanation:
Claire.

	Claire is from Orlando.  She lives in Massie's guesthouse.

questions.text: What is Layne's food obsession in this book?
questions.explanation:
oatmeal.

	Her food obsession was popcorn and mustard in the book "Best Friends for Never".  It was go-gurt in "The Pretty Committee Strikes Back".  It was popsicles in the book "Revenge Of the Wannabees".

false.

	She doesn't like Claire in the beginning, but she starts to like her towards the end.

questions.text: Who does Claire sit with at lunch?
questions.explanation:
Layne, Meena, and Heather.

	Layne likes to take pictures.

false.

	G.L.U. stands for Girls Like Us.  Massie made up that term.

Dylan.

	Merri-Lee Marvil is the host of the "The Daily Grind." It's a talk show.

questions.text: Whose idea was it to start a cosmetics company?
questions.explanation:
Massie.

	They made lip gloss because Kristen had to start her own company.  Massie had the idea because Dylan had cherries on her lips and Massie said "that's a good idea for a lip gloss."

Kristen.

	Kristen thought she was telling Massie, but she was actually telling Claire.

questions.text: Who did Claire instant message that everyone should wear shorts over tights?
questions.explanation:
Alicia.

	That was the first instant message Claire sent to Alicia.  She also told Alicia that Massie likes her.

questions.text: Who did Massie partner up with for tennis?
questions.explanation:
Saylene Homer.

	Kristen, Alicia, Claire, and Dylan already partnered up.  That's why Massie had to partner up with Saylene.
